name: postcss-transform-3d-accelerate
description: PostCSS plugin to convert 2D transforms to 3D transforms for GPU acceleration

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run update-changelog
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run update-changelog
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && npm run update-changelog

author: Da-Sheng
